chapters.title: Chapter 3: Friends and Enemies
chapters.info: Padan Fain, p. 39 (35)—Former peddler, now found to be a Darkfriend. He can sense the presence of Rand al'Thor from a long distance, and has stolen the Horn of Valere. His scent, as described by the Sniffer Hurin, is worse than Trollocs, worse than Fades—it is worse than evil. See also Mordeth.
